reviewText: Interesting and well-done documentary of David Livingstone, Scottish missionary and explorer to Africa. Good introduction to his life and extensive missionary travels and expeditions.
A good documentary.  But I desperately want "Secrets of the Dead, The Lost Diary of David Livingston".  Can you find it for me?
I was looking for something that was more story based.  If you are looking for a documentary then this is for  you.  I learned some new things about the missionary that I had not known in the past.
Really interesting. However concentrated much more on his explorations than it did on his faith. I found myself wanting to hear more about this side of the man than was included in this documentry.
